description: Injects TabMail theme CSS for Card View and Table View text colors and related tweaks (TB 141+, MV3).

functions.name: init
functions.description: Initialize theme CSS injection across all 3-pane windows.

functions.name: shutdown
functions.description: Remove injected CSS and cleanup listeners from all windows.

functions.name: setFlag
functions.description: Update a tmTheme runtime flag without full re-init.

functions.name: recolorNow
functions.description: Recolor visible rows/cards now after flag changes (no full re-init).
